meanings.definition: The branch of medicine concerned with the care of women during pregnancy and childbirth.
meanings.sent1: Perinatology focuses on helping women during pregnancy and childbirth.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in perinatology provide care for pregnant women.
meanings.sent3: The perinatology team made sure the mother-to-be was comfortable throughout her pregnancy.
meanings.sent4: The dedication of the perinatology staff shone brightly during the delivery.
meanings.sent5: Learning about perinatology can help expectant mothers feel more at ease.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty dealing with the care of the fetus and newborn infant.
meanings.sent1: The perinatology department focuses on the health of newborns and fetuses.
meanings.sent2: Perinatology plays a crucial role in ensuring the well-being of infants.
meanings.sent3: The perinatology unit celebrated the successful delivery of healthy babies.
meanings.sent4: The importance of perinatology in early life cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent5: The advancements in perinatology have significantly improved infant survival rates.
